column4: cwill1:in system->administration->screens and graphics (in the tab graphics card there r some specifications..how to knw those?)
don't, unless you have a problems
use a generic one matching the hightest res that you know works, if the autodetection doesn't work right
desktop effects or compiz are not working
fair warning, I haven't played with those before

and then change defaultdepth and depth to 16, and then sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart to reset the session, tell me what it does
